mapper.insert:
insert into device_damage_map
device_damage_map.damage_id,
device_damage_map.deivce_id,
device_damage_map.device_type,
values
#{damageId},
#{deivceId},
#{deviceType},
mapper.select: select device_damage_map.damage_id, device_damage_map.deivce_id, device_damage_map.device_type, device_damage_map.id form device_damage_map where device_damage_map.id = #{id}
